pages.text: Kare-ra wa (oku no) miseshime no rei ga kare-ra izen ni aru no ni anata ni kofuku yori mo, mushiro saiyaku o isoide motomeru. Shikashi anata no omo wa ningen no warui okonai ni taishi hontoni kan'yodeari, mata anata no omo wa, chobatsu ni mo hontoni tsuretsudearu
Shinjinai-sha-tachi wa,`naze omo kara kare-ra ni hitotsu no shirushi mo kudaranai nodarou ka.' To iu. Anata wa hitori no keikoku-sha ni suginai. Onono no min ni wa hitori no michibikite ga aru
Arra wa onono no josei ga, ninshin suru no o shitte ora re, mata sono shikyu no (taiji no toki ga) sugu owaru ka, mata nobiru ka o shitte ora reru. Subete no koto wa, kare no omoto de hakara rete iru
Kare wa yugen-kai mo gensho-kai mo shitte ora reru kata, idai ni shite shiko no kata de ara reru
Anata gataga kotoba o kakushite mo, mata koe o dashite itte mo, aruiwa yakan ni kakurete mo, mata hiruma kozen to dekakete mo,(zenchi no omo ni oite wa) onaji kotodearu

Kakujin ni wa, mae kara mo ushirokara mo,-ji kara tsugini (tenshi) ga tsuite ite, arra no o meirei ni yori kanshi shite iru. Hontoni arra wa, hito ga mizukara kaenai kagiri, kesshite hitobito (no unmei) o kae rarenai. Daga arra ga (ichido) hitobito ni sainan o kudasou to o nozomi ni nareba, sore wa kesshite yokeru koto wa dekinai. Kare-ra ni wa, kare no soto ni gadian wa nai nodearu
Kare koso wa inazuma o gen wa shite anata gata ni osore to kibo o daka se rare,(ame o fukumu) omoi kumo o okosa se rareru katadearu

Kaminari wa kare o tataete 唱念 Shi, mata tenshi-tachi mo kare o osorete 唱念 Suru. Kare wa raimei o okura re, kare-ra ga arra ni tsuite ronso shite iru ma ni, kore de kare no okonomino-sha o uta reru. Kare wa chikara aru kyoretsuna katadearu
